message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I estimate its value to be well above $8000. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price not only reflects the true worth of the product but also provides you with an opportunity to save $4000 compared to the market value. I look forward to your positive response.
